about_the_game:
[Succubus Memories] is an infinite stream theme of beauty girl dress up, love, battle brush treasure adventure theme game.

Players will play as a college graduate who had an accident in the modern world and traveled to various treacherous foreign worlds to complete the mission of the current time and space, during which they will fight side by side with several similar encounters with the story of beautiful girls.

Game Features -

The concept of infinite stream

Cultivation world, novel world, movie world, game world.

Beauty girl dressing system

Role-playing with a rich variety of beautiful girls in different time and space.

New “Dynamic Touch” Gameplay

Players can touch different parts of the character in the “Dynamic Touch” gameplay to unlock different stories, elevation drawings, voices, and more!

You can also unlock different “experiences” by selecting buttons such as “Caress” and “Dual Cultivation”.

Rich Battles in Different Time and Space

As the game develops, players will need to fight in different worlds and time zones.

The game is equipped with a rich equipment system, skill system, and beautiful girls to assist in the battle!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win10/win11
  • Processor: intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10/win11
  • Processor: intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: You accidentally step into the “mysterious space”, in the unknown time and space with a number of similar encounters with the beauty of the girl, what will happen to the strange encounter? By constantly getting stronger and evolving, you can “conquer” new beautiful girls!
